articles.author: NBCNews.com
articles.title: Viral video shows mighty bear cub aiming to reach parent atop snowy mountain
articles.description: In a captivating video, a bear and  its cub are seen making their way up a snowy mountain. When things go downhill.  the little- cub-that-could perseveres to the top.

articles.author: NBCNews.com
articles.title: Woman left paralyzed while trying to escape sexual assault conquers NYC marathon on crutches
articles.description: Just two years ago, Hannah Gavios Cross fell 150 feet off a cliff when she tried to escape from an attacker. Though she was told she may never walk again, Gavios completed the marathon in 11 hours and 20 minutes.
